titleStmt.title: The conflagration of London poetically delineated and directed to the most noble and deserving citizen Sir J.L. Knight and Baronet.
Conflagratio Londinensis poetice depicta. English & Latin
titleStmt.author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Written by Simon Ford. Cf. Wing and NUC pre-1956.
English and Latin on opposite pages.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
